name: Spicy Kabab Rice Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Spicy Kabab Rice Recipe: Sela Rice ½ kg Karahi Kabbab as required Chopped Garlic 1 tbsp Onion 1 tbsp Chopped Tomatoes 3-4 Red Chilies Paste 2 tbsp Crushed Black Pepper ½ tsp Turmeric Powder ½ tsp All Spice Powder ½ cup Whole Spices ½ cup Coriander ½ bunch Green Chilies 4-5 Oil 2-3 tbsp Salt to taste
instructions: Take ½ kg of sela rice clean and wash it off and soak it. Take a cooking pan add 2-3 tbsp of oil, heat the oil, ½ cup of whole spices when its popping Add 1 tbsp of ginger garlic paste and 1 onions and fry. Then add 3-4 tomatoes and roasted then add 2 tbsp of red chili paste Add ½ tsp of crushed black pepper, ½ tsp of turmeric powder, and add to taste salt mix it well. Now add ½ kg of soaked rice and as required water and cook. Now steam the rice add 4-5 green chilies, ½ bunch of coriander Add as required karahi kabbab mix it well steam it. At last take it out in a serving platter and serve it.
